original: intros n E t T H. intros x E' T' H1 H2. revert E. induction H; intros; simpl in *. - apply JVar. rewrite <- H1. apply H. - apply JAbs. apply IHj; auto. - apply JApp with (T1:=T1) (T2:=T2). + apply IHj1; auto. + apply IHj2; auto. - apply JTyAbs with (t:=t). apply IHj. rewrite map_insert_eq. * auto. * apply expand_subst. * apply expand_lift.
